material: Universal Emergency Breathing Supply System Hose
description: Universal Emergency Breathing Supply System Hose is a hose that allows two firefighters to share one air supply in an emergency.
short desc: UEBSS Hose allows two firefighters to share one air supply.
source: Sampled from a structural firefighter SCBA.

measured property.test description: Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.

derived property.test name: melting temperature and enthalpy of melting
